item.title: 2020’s Most Gorgeous Driving Game Gets Sequel With ‘Over The Hill’
item.description: The superb 'Art of Rally' finally gets a spiritual successor in 'Over the Hill', which takes the relaxed, cozy experience off road.

item.title: New Samsung Feature Will Change How You Use Your Galaxy Phone
item.description: Bixby isn't dead, it has a surprise new job.

item.title: How LilyEve Is Bringing Sustainability To Luxury
item.description: Each jacket, coat, and accessory is handcrafted from pre-loved materials sourced from luxury brands like Hermes and Gucci.

item.title: FBI Agents’ Call And Text Logs Potentially Stolen In Data Breach
item.description: FBI Agents' call and text logs may have been stolen in a data breach—could expose anonymous informants.

item.title: Inside Stargate’s AI Reality Distortion Field
item.description: The details of Stargate Project involve a collision of money, politics, and egos—with many potential conflicts down the road.
